name: amelie
description: HTML5 audio visualizer experiment using D3 with a curious theme.

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/*.html --dist-dir public --no-source-maps --public-url /Amelie
scripts.prestart: rm -fr .parcel-cache public && eslint --fix . && prettier --write . && mkdir public && npm run postbuild
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel serve src/*.html --dist-dir public --no-autoinstall --no-hmr --no-source-maps --open

author: Martin Mozos <martinmozos@gmail.com>
